topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553133a763687236e56a0400#post_553133a763687236e56a0400


Too_Offensive was chillin’ out in his caddy smokin’ on some dank weed with his homie, Carca$$ $trife. "drop it like it’s hot" was blastin’ from the from the speakers. The woofers was spittin out that dope ass bass line and shit.

"Sheeit, this some dank ass weed", Too_Offensive said puffin’ on the fattie.

"Yo, lemme get another puff of that, niggah", Carca$$ said.

"Fuck naw man, you smoked 3/4 of the bag, so fuck you dawg".

Too_Offensive kicked up his feet on the dashboard. He was wearing some sick ass J’S. He reached into his and pulled out a fat stack of benjamins.

CRASH! The windshield was shattered
topics.author: 37e5b9d66361642500af5e00

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553135a56368724a46122d00#post_553135a56368724a46122d00
I turned left on the green and this lady ran the red. Poor kid was fucking inconsolable afterwards, I think she'd just got off of night shift at the hospital and was heading to school. I slammed on my brakes, but we both had too much momentum to prevent a collision.

My grill and bumper were shredded, radiator was gushing and one head light was taken out. Her wheel well was wrecked.

Fortunately there was three or four people near by who saw the accident and rushed to help.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7
